website_summaries.verdict: Fans of the Yourflex Train line are quite pleased with this iteration. Though the upper possesses a sleeker silhouette, they are still satisfied with the foothold it delivers. Its low-profile sole unit facilitates smooth heel-to-toe transitions. Meanwhile, you won’t worry about slipping because of the grippy outsole.To top it off, the new upper construction ensures better breathability for longer-lasting comfort. It’s easy to see why the Yourflex Train 11 retained its following.
pros: A majority of the owners love how comfortable the Reebok Yourflex Train 11 is for working out
Given its quality build, many people claim that this pair of Reebok training shoes is worth the price
A lot of users enjoy how light this trainer is on their feet
Many reviewers describe the outsole to be grippy on various surfaces
Aside from gym use, numerous individuals have stated that this footwear is also suitable for walking and short runs
Style-wise, multiple shoppers are pleased with this model
cons: According to several owners, the feeling of tightness goes away after a short break-in period
A few wearers have noted that the shape of the insole makes it a bit tricky to put on

customer_reviews.title: OK for the price
customer_reviews.text: A sign on the box says comfort memory guaranteed for 30 days. What does that mean? The cushioning is going to go after 30 days? They fit a little snug (size 12 US) and my heel feels it is sliding off and one foot feels it wants to slip inward. However, I did a run and they held up ok. No knee or ankle problems. I will come back later to say how these held up.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: More like a running shoe but very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are not workout shoes. More like running shoes with the thick cushy outsole, not the grip you would need for high energy changes in direction. They feel very comfortable for daily use so I’ll give an extra star for that.
customer_reviews.author: caesar.barr

customer_reviews.title: photos for products should match the shoes you get!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two of these shoes that show the green " Massage" type insole and neither one had them in them. I had an old pair and I was able to get them out and put them in the new shoes. I really like that green MemoryTechMassage insole and they really need to get the pictures of the product right. they are light weight and will work for a while with the old insoles. I'll wear them a bit and if they don't work I will send them back. I wish I could get what I see in the product photos!! :-(
customer_reviews.author: psvym

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing changes in what was a great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing these shoes since their inception and I go through about 8 pairs a year working out most days. The new model #11 isn’t as good as the #10. The insole is very hard not as pictured and the overall shoe has somewhat less cushion that’s a double whammy. I’m hoping Reebok revisits older models and corrects problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after my previous trainers tore a hole in them! I ordered these as they seemed similar to the ones I previously had. They're a great value for money. At first, the right sneaker did feel tighter than the left one, but after a few wears, they both seem the same now! I recommend these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Maya82

customer_reviews.title: Too small to fit
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it is too small to fit my foot and I have worn this type of shoe before, I have an older version, that was why i ordered it. Unfortunately I missed the return time or I would have returned them. A big waste of money :(
customer_reviews.author: GermanShep1

customer_reviews.title: Great look, alright fit
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the shoe. That's what prompted me to buy. It is a bit small although in all honesty I have a large and wide foot. 14EE. I was slightly surprised that Reebok shoe was narrower than expected. It's alright, though. I am still pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mono

customer_reviews.title: GREAT MATERIALS.
customer_reviews.text: BELIEVE ME THESE SHOES ARE MADE FROM HIGH QUALITY MATERIALS.. EVERY PART OF THE SHOE. My regret is that they are not as shockproof as i thought they would be.
customer_reviews.author: MARCO'

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Was not going to keep them.....husband loves them....keepers! I bought 4 pair of shoes....2 Reebok, 1 Dr Scholls, 1 New Balance.....sending back new balance....
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Winland

customer_reviews.title: No memory tech sock liner
customer_reviews.text: There is no sock liner. There is just a loose memory tech insert. It is not attached to the shoe. What a stupid idea. Does not match the item description or picture at all.
customer_reviews.author: bxc20

customer_reviews.title: Good value, hard insoles.
customer_reviews.text: Great sneaker, but the insoles are of harder material. They are the hardest I've ever experienced.
customer_reviews.author: slucky

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: While I didn't buy this shoe to use in the gym, I could clearly see using it for that purpose. It fits well and breathes very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell J. Hahn

customer_reviews.title: No cushion
customer_reviews.text: Fits a little narrow and not a lot of cushion. Not good for people on their feet all day. Maybe younger people not my 56 year old feet lol
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable and fit well. Be careful on wet tile as the traction isn't all that great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit. Narrow and ankle Flair's
customer_reviews.text: Was narrow and the ankle Flair's our as ur step... I'm 5'8" 155 fit individual and wear a 9.5 length was perfect. But it was too narrow everywhere on the foot and like I said as u step the part surrounding ur ankle Flair's. Very unfomfortable
customer_reviews.author: A. Cowan

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I really like this model of shoe but for some reason this one was a little large. Nothing crazy but I do find my toe catching a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Maney

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: very comfy. They stretched for a few days but eventually stopped and now they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Katosha W.

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad shoe...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes provided the expected experience from a pair of Reebok shoes. Nothing special about the comfort that differentiate them from other Reebok's, It was nice to find a half size (12.5) though as many stores do not carry them in stock.
customer_reviews.author: C Hen.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fit great, very comfy and look good. Would for sure buy again.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Will Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: Very happy and as advertised. True to size and super lightweight. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Saitta

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Very light and comfortable but challenging to put on due to insole design
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It's not the same size as in other shoes, besides that is very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Darwin

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight and comfortable, without losing support while running.
customer_reviews.author: Dave and Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Solid shoe
customer_reviews.text: It’s great high quality and a good price solid shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Austin Goyette

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: Way too big if you order your usual size and just a little tight if you order half size under
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro R.

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shoe as it's still real comfortable unfortunately it didn't last long as I bought these 6 months ago and I've only really worn them indoors and you see the tear in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Sal S.

customer_reviews.title: Review of the product I received
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the product I received Sneakers are extremely comfortable and useful. Delivery was fast and arrived on time and the price was very low and good.
customer_reviews.author: Moshe Avidor

customer_reviews.title: The Gel Insole Not Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Going to try and replace the insole with Dr. Schols. Shoe looks good and is very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: jason jesty

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Classy and comfortable. Lightweight shoes. Good for every day use.
customer_reviews.author: Roza P.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes
customer_reviews.text: I use it to work at Amazon on sort side also as rebinner they better. Then my Skechers
customer_reviews.author: el pinguo

product_meta.title: Reebok mens Yourflex Train 11 Mt
product_meta.description: Deliver the workout results you are looking for with the help of the Reebok® Yourflex Train 11 MT sneaker. Synthetic mesh upper for comfort, fit, and breathability. Traditional lace-up closure. Padded tongue and collar. Closed round toe. Textile lining and MemoryTech™ sockliner for increased cushioning. IMEVA midsole for cushioning and responsiveness. Carbon rubber heel strike lends durable traction. YourFlex™ technology combines an all-over lightweight construction with RealFlex-inspired outsole nodes to promote natural motion. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 8 oz Product measurements were taken using size 9.5, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: Deliver the workout results you are looking for with the help of the Reebok® Yourflex Train 11 MT sneaker.
Synthetic mesh upper for comfort, fit, and breathability.

Closed round toe. Textile lining and MemoryTech™ sockliner for increased cushioning. IMEVA midsole for cushioning and responsiveness. Carbon rubber heel strike lends durable traction. YourFlex™ technology combines an all-over lightweight construction with RealFlex-inspired outsole nodes to promote natural motion. Imported.
